text: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice
author: Henry Ford

text: I don’t care what you think about me. I don’t think about you at all
author: Gabrielle Bonheur Coco Chanel

text: Work hard to get what you like, otherwise you'll be forced to just like what you get
author: George Bernard Shaw

text: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends
author: Martin Luther King

text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: Success is the ability to go from failure to failure without losing your enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: There is no such thing as an accident. What we call by that name is the effect of some cause which we do not see
author: Voltaire

text: The biggest risk is not taking any risk. In a world that's changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks
author: Mark Zuckerberg

text: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about
author: Marilyn Monroe

text: Life is a series of choices
author: Michel de Notredame

text: The purpose of life is to live correctly, think correctly, and act correctly
author: Mahatma Gandhi

text: As long as man continues to be the ruthless destroyer of lower living beings he will never know health or peace. For as long as men massacre animals, they will kill each other
author: Pifagor

text: The first thing you learn in life is you're a fool. The last thing you learn in life is you're the same fool
author: James Bradberry

text: Love suffers long and is kind; love does not envy; love does not parade itself, is not puffed up; Does not behave rudely, does not seek its own, is not provoked, thinks no evil; Does not rejoice in iniquity, but rejoices in the truth
author: Paul the Apostle

text: Love is a friendship set to music
author: Joseph John Campbell

text: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life
author: Confucius

text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity
author: Hans Albert Einstein

text: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds
author: Hans Albert Einstein

text: And if you gaze long into an abyss, the abyss also gazes into you
author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
